name: Colorules
description:
It's our entry for the 2n edition of the GameGen Jam that's organized by VirtualSoul. The theme of the jam was "3 RULES", and our entry is a hyper casual color based game.

The main objective of the game is to arrive to each level's goal. For that, you'll have to avoid some obstacles and resolve some puzzles, and make use of 3 main rules to avoid loosing. 
The only controls are your mouse.

Thanks for playing!
